## getLoader() function

returns loader for schemas based on the URL protocol


**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getLoader(url: string, ipfsConfigUrl?: string): ISchemaLoader;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | schema url |
|  ipfsConfigUrl | string | _(Optional)_ ipfs node host url |

**Returns:**

[ISchemaLoader](./js-sdk.ischemaloader.md)

ISchemaLoader
